channel.title: Krvavec on Martin's Blog 3
channel.description: Recent content in Krvavec on Martin's Blog 3

item.title: Ski Wednesday
item.description: Krvavec My recent trip to Slovenia gave me the repeat opportunity to do some skiing again which I was looking forward of doing on the ski resort of Krvavec. I am proud to report no falls or injuries whatsoever. The place was absolutely packed, probably due to the fact that it was in that weird time between Christmas and New Year and lots of people had the time off work.
